text: The 1970 European Karate Championships, the 5th edition, was held in Hamburg, Germany from May 5 to 7, 1970. ==Medalists== {| |- |rowspan=2|Ippon |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Team |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- |} ==Medal table== ==References== ==External links== *Karate Records - European Championship 1970 1970 Category:International sports competitions hosted by Germany European Karate Championships European championships in 1970 Category:Sports competitions in Hamburg Category:1970s in Hamburg Category:Karate competitions in Germany Category:May 1970 sports events in Europe
title: 1970 European Karate Championships
